name: Memberstack
headline: Add user accounts and payments to any website with one line of code
description:
Memberstack makes it easy to add user accounts and recurring payments to static websites, Webflow, Squarespace, and more! 

We’ve helped 1000+ companies generate millions in recurring revenue, and we’re just getting started 😁 If we succeed, Memberstack will enable hundreds of thousands of people to create powerful web apps and massive online businesses.

Memberstack is backed by some incredible leaders, advisors, and investors who helped build the companies we use every day. Check the link for more info 👇

https://www.memberstack.com/blog/1000-customers-and-fundraise

founders.name: Duncan Hamra, Founder
founders.description: I love to build things. Currently converting a van into a tiny home when I'm not working on Memberstack.

generated_description:
**Memberstack: A Seamless Solution for Web Monetization**

Founded in 2019 and a product of Y Combinator's S20 batch, Memberstack has quickly made a name for itself in the no-code tools arena. Its core mission is straightforward: add user accounts and recurring payment systems to any website with just a single line of code. This powerful simplicity has allowed over 1,000 companies to generate millions in recurring revenue—a sign of the massive potential they aim to unlock by helping users create robust web applications and businesses.

### What They Do

Headquartered in Williamsburg, VA, and supported by a nimble team of seven, Memberstack specializes in integrating user accounts and payments into static sites built on platforms like Webflow and Squarespace. They’ve crafted a tool that not only enables businesses to enhance their websites with memberships but does so in a way that is easy to implement and scale. Think of it as the secret sauce for developers and entrepreneurs looking to monetize their web applications without heavy lifting.

### Key Features & Offerings

1. **User Management**: Effortlessly create and manage user accounts.
2. **Payment Integration**: Built on Stripe, Memberstack provides access to over 40 payment methods globally, ensuring you can cater to diverse audiences.
3. **Gated Content**: You can restrict access to content based on user membership tiers.
4. **Extensive Integration**: Native support for tools like Webflow, allowing for seamless user experiences.
5. **Community Support**: A vibrant Slack community and a resourceful knowledge base to assist users in getting the most out of Memberstack.

### Growth and Community Impact

Memberstack is not just a tool; it’s a community. With over 50,000 users and a track record that includes helping to process more than $128 million through their platform, they are committed to supporting the web development community. Their ethos centers around empowering users—regardless of their technical expertise—to launch and scale their projects effortlessly.

### Pricing Model

Memberstack operates on a freemium model—users can utilize many features for free until they launch, at which point they can customize their plans based on their scaling needs. This flexibility makes it particularly appealing for startups and new ventures that need to watch their budgets closely.

### Customer Feedback

Users rave about Memberstack's ease of use and the support they receive. Designers, developers, and entrepreneurs alike praise its intuitive setup and responsive customer service. Testimonials echo sentiments of a community-centric tool that doesn’t just promise results but delivers.

### Looking Ahead

With ambitious goals to help hundreds of thousands of individuals build impactful online platforms, Memberstack is on an upward trajectory. For anyone looking to enhance their website’s capabilities without the hassle of complex backend coding, Memberstack stands out as a leading choice.

In essence, Memberstack simplifies what can often be a complicated process—transforming static websites into powerful, revenue-generating machines with minimal friction.

For more information, check out their website at [Memberstack](https://www.memberstack.com).
